00014 // Specify (name, pdg code, mass in GeV, width in GeV, charge)
00015 #define PARTICLE_DATA_TABLE(d)                                                          \
00016     d(PHOTON,               22,             0.E+00f,             0.E+00f,       0)      \
00017     d(E_MINUS,              11,     5.10998902E-04f,             0.E+00f,      -1)      \

00027     d(NU_TAU,               16,             0.E+00f,             0.E+00f,       0)      \
00028     d(NU_TAU_BAR,          -16,             0.E+00f,             0.E+00f,       0)      \
00029     d(PI_PLUS,             211,      1.3957018E-01f,         2.5284E-17f,      +1)      \

00033     d(LAMBDA_BAR,        -3122,       1.115683E+00f,          2.501E-15f,       0)      \

00054 #define GET_PARTICLE_TYPE_ENTRY(a, b, c, d, e)                                          \
00055     a = b,
00056 
00060 #define GET_PARTICLE_TYPE_SWITCH(a, b, c, d, e)                                         \
00061     case b : return a;
00062 
00066 #define GET_PARTICLE_NAME_SWITCH(a, b, c, d, e)                                         \
00067     case a : return std::string(#a);
00068 
00072 #define GET_PARTICLE_PDG_CODE_SWITCH(a, b, c, d, e)                                     \
00073     case a : return b;
00074 
00078 #define GET_PARTICLE_MASS_SWITCH(a, b, c, d, e)                                         \
00079     case a : return c;
00080 
00084 #define GET_PARTICLE_WIDTH_SWITCH(a, b, c, d, e)                                        \
00085     case a : return d;
00086 
00090 #define GET_PARTICLE_CHARGE_SWITCH(a, b, c, d, e)                                       \
00091     case a : return e;
00092 
00096 enum ParticleType
00097 {
00098     PARTICLE_DATA_TABLE(GET_PARTICLE_TYPE_ENTRY)
00099     UNKNOWN_PARTICLE_TYPE
00100 };
00101 
00102 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 
00108 class PdgTable
00109 {
00110 public:
00118     static ParticleType GetParticleType(const int pdgCode);
00119 
00127     static std::string GetParticleName(const int pdgCode);
00128 
00136     static int GetParticlePdgCode(const int pdgCode);
00137 
00145     static float GetParticleMass(const int pdgCode);
00146 
00154     static float GetParticleWidth(const int pdgCode);
00155 
00163     static int GetParticleCharge(const int pdgCode);
00164 };
00165 
00166 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00167 
00168 inline ParticleType PdgTable::GetParticleType(const int pdgCode)
00169 {
00170     switch (pdgCode)
00171     {
00172         PARTICLE_DATA_TABLE(GET_PARTICLE_TYPE_SWITCH)
00173         default : throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 
00179 inline std::string PdgTable::GetParticleName(const int pdgCode)
00180 {
00181     switch (pdgCode)
00182     {
00183         PARTICLE_DATA_TABLE(GET_PARTICLE_NAME_SWITCH)
00184         default : throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00185     }
00186 }
00187 
00188 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00189 
00190 inline int PdgTable::GetParticlePdgCode(const int pdgCode)
00191 {
00192     switch (pdgCode)
00193     {
00194         PARTICLE_DATA_TABLE(GET_PARTICLE_PDG_CODE_SWITCH)
00195         default : throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00196     }
00197 }
00198 
00199 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00200 
00201 inline float PdgTable::GetParticleMass(const int pdgCode)
00202 {
00203     switch (pdgCode)
00204     {
00205         PARTICLE_DATA_TABLE(GET_PARTICLE_MASS_SWITCH)
00206         default : throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00207     }
00208 }
00209 
00210 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00211 
00212 inline float PdgTable::GetParticleWidth(const int pdgCode)

00214     switch (pdgCode)

00216         PARTICLE_DATA_TABLE(GET_PARTICLE_WIDTH_SWITCH)

00218     }

00221 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00223 inline int PdgTable::GetParticleCharge(const int pdgCode)
00224 {
00225     switch (pdgCode)
